trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Durham
There were no other sightings in Durham on or around July 31st 2010
Summary: I saw a very bright orange light moving slowly from the west.
divs: Sighting Detailsstanding at my back door i saw a very bright orange light moving from the west i shouted to my wife to see it and it came closer and slowed down it looked like the light was moving or spinning we both noticed an orange hook like light at the top of the ufo we lost site of it for a few seconds behind a house next door it then appeared again and headed NNE at a very high speed and i lost site of it it made no sound.
